trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Beverly
There was one other sighting in Beverly on or around August 22nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsSeven adults sitting on the beach noticed a solid red rectangular object in the night sky out over the water. The sky was clear. The object remained stationary for a few minutes, never varying in size or shape and then appeared to lift away in a light mist. A photo was taken on my cell phone as it began to lift away but its not very good.
Summary: Group of seven adults sitting on the beach noticed a solid red rectangular light in the night sky out over the water, didnt appear to be too far away and not very high. Object did not move and then lifted away slowly
